PSCT.Vegas:
2 Level 6 monsters
① Once per turn, if a monster effect is activated on your opponent's field (Even in the Damage Step) (Quick): 
You can detach 1 Material from this card; negate the effect, and if you do, your opponent takes 1000 damage.

PSCT.Base:
2 Level 6 monsters
Once per turn, during either player's turn, when a monster effect is activated on your opponent's side of the field: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate the effect, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
